title: Mera Bhai
overview: This series shows the love-hate relationship of two brothers who happen to have, totally poles apart personalities. Bittu (Elder brother) is in his final year of college and is preparing for his job placement. Sittu (Younger brother) is in class 10th and is way too chill to be giving board exams the same year. This show captures the most relatable yet hilarious nuances of BHAI-BHAI relation.
